message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to you is estimated at $1,000,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-end asset at a premium rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.
